channel.title: Do I use 0.0.0.0 for my login ip?
channel.description:
I read this somewhere on this site and just asking because I got a bit confused when I read it. Do I use 0.0.0.0 for my login ip? And other players use my no-ip? Do I change all the 127.0.0.1 ip's in my source and client to my no-ip? Then for myself I use the ip 0.0.0.0?
-Thank you

item.title: Do I use 0.0.0.0 for my login ip?
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:6, topic:394091”][quote author=Dharma link=topic=491276.msg3592724#msg3592724 date=1304783372]

Go into Client.java and search for 127.0.0.1

Replace that with your No-ip address. Do the same with Gui.java.

This is client-sided btw.

Thank you!
Do you think you’d be able to see if it works if I were to send you the client?
[/quote]Sure, I’ve got nothing else to do at the moment lol. And you’ve portforwarded port 43594 right?[/quote]

Yup! 43594!
It’s not really done… I’m going to be using the back up source(incase I mess up) so it’s not going to be much. I’ll upload to mediafire and pm you the link!

Read full topic
item.source: Do I use 0.0.0.0 for my login ip?

item.title: Do I use 0.0.0.0 for my login ip?
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:394091”]0.0.0.0 is on the SOURCE

127.0.0.1 is on the CLIENT[/quote]

Lol wait then where do I put my no-Ip? I only change it in the clients right? And for the server I leave it as 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
